/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their red and orange facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, power lines crisscross the sky, adding a touch of complexity to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
